original: tadyathā duḥkhaṁ samudayo nirodho mārga iti ;
analyzed: tat yathā duḥkham samudayaḥ nirodhaḥ mārgaḥ iti

original: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā * paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣo tīrṇaviciksaḥ aparapratyayo'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuś  #
analyzed: atha anāthapiṇḍadaḥ gṛhapatiḥ dṛṣṭa dharmā prāpta dharmā vidita dharmā paryavagāḍha dharmā tīrṇa kāṅkṣaḥ tīrṇa viciksaḥ apara pratyayaḥ an anya neyaḥ śāstuḥ

original: śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṁsam uttarāsaṅgaṁ kṛtvā ,

original: yena bhagavāṁs tenāñjaliṁ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat :

original: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṁ gṛhapatim idam avocat :

original: asti bhadanta prācīneṣu janapadeṣu śrāvastī nāma kosalānāṁ nigamaḥ ;
analyzed: asti bhadanta prācīneṣu janapadeṣu śrāvastī nāma kosalānām nigamaḥ

original: A nāthapiṇḍada invites the Buddha to Shravasti
analyzed: a nāthapiṇḍada invites the buddha to shravasti

original: ahaṁ bhagavantam upasthāsyāmi yāvajjīvaṁ cīvarapiṇḍapātaglānapratyayabhaiṣaiyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṁ bhikṣusaṅghena ;
analyzed: aham bhagavantam upasthāsyāmi yāvajjīvam cīvara piṇḍapāta glāna pratyaya bhaiṣaiya pariṣkāraiḥ sārdham bhikṣu saṅghena

analyzed: aham tathā kariṣyāmi yathā śrāvastyām vihārāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: bhiṣavaś ca āgantavyaṁ gantavyaṁ vastavyaṁ maṁsyanta iti ;
analyzed: bhiṣavaḥ ca āgantavyam gantavyam vastavyam masyantaḥ iti

original: tato'sya yad rājagṛhe kṛtyaṁ vā karaṇīyaṁ vā tat sarvaṁ kṛtvā pariprāpya * punar yena bhagavāṁs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ ;
analyzed: tatas asya yat rājagṛhe kṛtyam vā karaṇīyam vā tat sarvam kṛtvā pariprāpya punar yena bhagavān tena upasaṅkrāntaḥ

original: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ ;
analyzed: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ
ekānta niṣaṇṇaḥ anāthapiṇḍadaḥ gṛhapatiḥ bhagavantam idam avocat

original: anuprayaccha me bhagavan bhikṣuṁ sahāyakam yena sahāyakena śrāvastyāṁ bhagavato'rthāya vihāraṁ kārayāmīti ;
analyzed: anuprayaccha me bhagavan bhikṣum sahāyakam yena sahāyakena śrāvastyām bhagavataḥ arthāya vihāram kārayāmi iti

original: samanvāhara śāriputra anāthapiṇḍadaṁ gṛhapatim saparivāraṁ śrāvastīnivāsinaṁ ca janakāyam iti ;
analyzed: samanvāhara śāriputra anāthapiṇḍadam gṛhapatim sa parivāram śrāvastī nivāsinam ca jana kāyam iti

analyzed: asthā āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ tasyāḥ eva rātreḥ atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya

original: rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṁ śayanāsanaṁ pratiśamayya ,
analyzed: rājagṛham piṇḍāya caritvā kṛta bhakta kṛtyaḥ paścāt bhakta piṇḍapāta pratikrāntaḥ yathā paribhuktam śayana āsanam pratiśamayya

original: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṁ śambalam ādāya ekaikarātrinivāsena śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ ;

original: kataraḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati śrāvastyā nātidūre nātyāsanne divā alpākīrṇo'lpavilāpo rātrāv alpaśabdo'lpanirghoṣaḥ alpadaṁśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṁsparśaḥ
analyzed: kataraḥ sa pṛthivī pradeśaḥ bhaviṣyati śrāvastyāḥ na atidūre na ati āsanne divā alpa ākīrṇaḥ alpa vilāpaḥ rātrau alpa śabdaḥ alpa nirghoṣaḥ alpa daśa maśaka vāta ātapa sarīsṛpa sa sparśaḥ
yatra aham bhagavataḥ arthāya vihāram māpayiṣyāmi iti

original: jetasya kumarasyārāmaṁ śrāvastyā nātidūre nātyāsanne divā alpākīrṇam alpavilāpaṁ rātrāv alpaśabdaṁ alpanirghoṣāṁ alpa )
analyzed: jetasya kumarasya ārāmam śrāvastyāḥ na atidūre na ati āsanne divā alpa ākīrṇam alpa vilāpam rātrau alpa śabdam alpa nirghoṣām alpa
daśa maśaka vāta ātapa sarīsṛpa sparśam

original: atrāhaṁ bhagavato'rthāya vihāraṁ māpayiṣyāmīti sa praviśann eva svaṁ niveśanaṁ yena jetaḥ kumāras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ ;
analyzed: atra aham bhagavataḥ arthāya vihāram māpayiṣyāmi iti sa praviśan eva svam niveśanam yena jetaḥ kumāraḥ tena upasaṅkrāntaḥ

original: ahaṁ tatra bhagavato'rthāya vihāraṁ kārayāmi iti ;
analyzed: aham tatra bhagavataḥ arthāya vihāram kārayāmi iti

original: dvir api trir apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaṁ kumāram idam avocat :

original: punar apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaṁ kumaram idam avocat :

analyzed: na ati prabhūtam yena ayam an āstīrṇaḥ pṛthivī pradeśaḥ āstariṣyati

original: yāvat saptame divase anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā vistīrṇāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe āsanaprajñaptiḥ kāritā ;

original: śrāvastīnivāsi janakāyaḥ anekāni ca tatsāmaṅtanivāsīni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi ,

original: tata āyuṣmān śāriputro'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā saparivāreṇa saṁpuraskṛto vādimaṇḍalaṁ praviśya vineyajanam abhisamīkṣya smitapūrvaṁ samaśānteneryāpathena  #
analyzed: tatas āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā sa parivāreṇa sa puraskṛtaḥ vādi maṇḍalam praviśya vineya janam abhisamīkṣya smita pūrvam sama śāntena īryāpathena  /

original: sarvaiva sā parṣad avahitacetaskā āyuṣmantam śāriputraṁ abhisamīkṣamāṇā niṣaṇṇā |

original: iti viditvā raktākṣaṁ parivrājakam idam avocat : tvaṁ kuru ,

original: yenāsau samūla utpāṭya itaś cāmutaś ca vikīrṇo yogijanānām apy aviṣayībhūtaḥ ;

ārya śāriputra trāyasva śaraṇa āgataḥ asmi iti

analyzed: traidhātuka vīta rāgaḥ sama loṣṭa kāñcanaḥ ākāśa pāṇitala sama cittaḥ vāsī candana kalpaḥ vidyā vidārita āṇḍakośaḥ vidyā abhijña pratisavit prāptaḥ bhava lābha lobha parāṅmukhaḥ

original: sendropendrāṇāṁ devānāṁ pūjyo mānyo'bhivādyaś ca saṁvṛttaḥ ;
analyzed: sa indra upendrāṇām devānām pūjyaḥ mānyaḥ abhivādyaḥ ca sa vṛttaḥ
